generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Senior Trump official embellished résumé, had face on fake Time cover," you may expect to read an analysis of the implications surrounding a former Trump administration official who allegedly misrepresented their credentials. The article is likely to provide details about the specific embellishments made on the résumé, the context in which these claims were made, and how the fake Time magazine cover fits into a broader narrative about authenticity and credibility in political appointments. Additionally, it could explore potential repercussions for the individual and the administration as a whole, while also examining public reactions and the credibility of political figures.
